title: 服务器卡顿
author: a1263513189
txt_content:
服务器卡顿的时候后台就会出现
[Server] WARN Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 11773ms behind, skipping 235 tick(s)求大神解答！

replies.author: DustSettles
replies.txt_content:
服务器cpu性能不够了
这个提示的意思就是服务器超载了

replies.author: DustSettles
replies.txt_content:
a1263513189 发表于 2016-2-13 23:34
不可能吧！
你可以看一下cpu占用，卡的时候是否有一个核心快满了

replies.author: a1263513189
replies.txt_content:
DustSettles 发表于 2016-2-13 23:32
服务器cpu性能不够了
这个提示的意思就是服务器超载了
不可能吧！

replies.author: 低洼688
replies.txt_content: 减少人数吧，提高内存，或者安装一个好显卡就好了

replies.author: a1263513189
replies.txt_content:
低洼688 发表于 2016-2-14 13:08

replies.author: POPOfish
replies.txt_content: 服务器负载，或许有玩家正在跑图？
